Package com.arjuna.ArjunaCommon.Common

Interface Summary
EnvironmentManager Each module which provides configuration options via an Environment class must provide an implementation of this interface.
 

Class Summary
ClassName Each implementation type may provide an instance of this class to uniquely identify itself to its users and the Inventory.
ClassPathParser This class parses the CLASSPATH and returns the directories used within it.
Configuration This class contains various run-time configuration options.
DebugController This class controls the debugging that can be output by the system.
DebugLevel The various levels of debugging that are available.
Environment The various property variables that can be set at runtime to configure the some of the classes within the package.
ErrorStream The error stream class.
FacilityCode The various levels of facility codes that are available.
FileLock Sometimes it is necessary to lock a file at the disk level.
InputBuffer An InputBuffer is used to retrieve various Java types from a byte stream created using an OutputBuffer.
InputObjectState InputObjectState provides some additional methods to a basic InputBuffer.
Mutex  
ObjectName Instances of this class can be used to convey arbitrary configuration information to classes.
OutputBuffer An OuptputBuffer is used to store various Java types as a byte stream.
OutputObjectState OutputObjectState provides some additional methods to a basic OutputBuffer.
PropertyManager The PropertyManager class provides a uniform interface to accessing and manipulating Java properties.
Uid Implements a unique identity class.
Utility Various useful functions that we wrap in a single class.
VisibilityLevel The various visibility levels that are available.
 

Error Summary
FatalError This error is thrown if a fatal error occurs which would prevent further progress without possibly compromising consistency.
LicenceError This error is thrown if a licence violation occurs.
